Reviews.Title: “Great Location -- Disappointing Room”
Reviews.Author: Car0Sel
Reviews.Content: reviews looks hit miss hotel location excellent hyde park kensington palace close tube welcome cool wi fi cost extra continental breakfast included teacoffee juice toast jam clean poor condition stains carpet faded bedding light fixtures falling wall drawer handles drawer rolled mattress remained hallway floor outside entire stay friendliness helpfulness staff varied deal booked advance stay hotel charged fee changing reservation weeks notice

Reviews.Title: “Well, Not good, Not that bad.”
Reviews.Author: ReggieW80
Reviews.Content: stayed 2 nights deluxe twin spacious yellowish decor ok bit bit tv breakfast ok staff nice left laundry bag receipt day laundry returned evening untouched staff forget laundry company bag reception am fine staff sincerely expressed sorry

Reviews.Title: “very disappointed”
Reviews.Author: sahara07
Reviews.Content: family travelling lot seen dirty furniture hotel towels changed everyday smelling badly cleanthe breakfast contained bread butter jam orange juice missing third daythe hotel location disappointed arrival spent lovely time amazing town

Reviews.Title: “Excellent hotel - first class room and service”
Reviews.Author: UKApollo
Reviews.Content: wife stayed hotel november 2010 3 night stay london stayed hotels found faultless premier spacious clean comfortable staff friendly helpful english breakfast breakfast location london break ideal maximum 15 minutes west tube taxi value money chosen hotel vist london future doubt understand family run 50 wonder successful

Reviews.Title: “Average”
Reviews.Author: lisylou_10
Reviews.Content: booked couple days getting married arrival hotel greeted happy pleasant greeting lovely impressions closer look nice size booked premier double impression separate seating read booking sofa 2 chairs coffee table wasnt huge cleanliness bathroom awful bath black inside bath actually black shower nice impossible stand underneath shower hold shower head husband stand outside bath holding shower head able wash impressed booking impression view kensington palace actually view russian embassy wouldnt bothered slightest black white expect agree review read hotel refurb look bit dated day leaving breakfast restaurant cold staff pleasant coffee told fetch ourselves breakfast egg sausage bacon tomato husband english breakfast arrived actually exactly plate nice menu soft eggs cooked request guests ours arrived practically raw top overall average hotel stay

Reviews.Title: “More space for the money”
Reviews.Author: jkl2000
Reviews.Content: spent week hotel originally booked standard triple adults child baby found little partly due single beds crib lot floor space told push single beds instead opted switch deluxe triple originally booked didnt available book phone tell able tell type found standard bit shoddy cozy deluxe nicer larger arranged expensive standard balcony overlooking bayswater road deluxe balcony overlooked preferable hotel trees little bit view hotel door deluxe quiter facing bayswater wasnt overly noisy hotel staff nice helpful breakfast delivered mornings charge fee location able kensington gardens hyde park easily central tube line convenient course hotel improve add smal refrigerators kept milk yogurt baby fridge counter lobby nice fetching whenever fridge helped lot pillow hard improved dont believe youll larger 106 price london nice avoid chain hotels

Reviews.Title: “Great value and excellant location”
Reviews.Author: Jerry047
Reviews.Content: spent 7 nights june hotel single delux paid 144 canadian night 6 nights 7th night free included breckfast juices single 5th floor comfortable air conditioning windows bath trouble sleeping day restocked teacoffee sugar tv reception varied times result lose cable connection staff helpful friendly throughout excellent 2 subway stops 5 minute walk direction hotel park opposite hotel enjoyed various ethnic foods stay hotel

Reviews.Title: “very nice hotel indeed”
Reviews.Author: LeedsPensioner
Reviews.Content: stayed 3 nights hotel staff helpful trouble comfortable beds bathroom spotless breakfast excellent location 60s buses locations outside hotel door bus pass lot coming via kings cross station bus outside hotel takes directly station lovely break hotel

Reviews.Title: “Good value and friendly staff”
Reviews.Author: fromupnorthLeeds
Reviews.Content: stayed 1 night clean comfortable quiet breakfast freshly cooked staff nice helpful location public transport hyde park restaurants nearby drawback store luggage securely check return luggage stay

Reviews.Title: “Lovely!”
Reviews.Author: baad_14
Reviews.Content: sister stayed trip london loved location wonderful 3 tube stations walking distance hyde park directly street makes view bayswater road busy city girls didnt notice noise breakfast sufficient dinner multiple bella italia favorites staff phenominal held luggage arrived 7am freshen left hotel helpful questions london overall nice attitude reccomend hotel stay london location looking decent price
